timeline.message:
DHFPROD-4727: Fixing MasterTest failure

Also speeding up bootstrap by deploying the test final-database.json via a single call, as opposed to all the overhead of datahub.updateIndexes()

timeline.bodyText: The param datahub can be removed.
timeline.author: rahulvudutala
